    • addSubscriber

      public void addSubscriber​(int id, String name, int age, int hours, int indexState, int indexType)
      Add a subscriber with the information entered.
      Parameters:
      id - , is the identification of the subscriber to register
      name - , is the name of the subscriber to register
      age - , is the age of the subscriber to register
      hours - , is the number of hours the subscriber to register will consume
      indexState - , is the number that represents the state of the subscriber to register between 1 and 2
      indexType - , is the number that represents the type of subscriber to register between 1 and 4
